statements: SELECT * FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact;
SELECT population, carbon_emissions FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact;
SELECT city_name, population, infrastructure_rating FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact WHERE carbon_emissions > 50;
SELECT city_name, population, infrastructure_rating FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact WHERE population >= 100000;
SELECT city_name, infrastructure_rating FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact ORDER BY infrastructure_rating DESC;
SELECT city_name, population, carbon_emissions, infrastructure_rating FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY carbon_emissions DESC, infrastructure_rating ASC
SELECT population, infrastructure_rating FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact WHERE city_name = 'New York'
SELECT city_name, carbon_emissions FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact WHERE infrastructure_rating >= 3 ORDER BY city_name ASC
SELECT * FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact WHERE carbon_emissions BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY city_name DESC
SELECT city_name, population, carbon_emissions FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact WHERE infrastructure_rating < 3
SELECT * FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact WHERE city_name = 'New York';
SELECT city_name, temperature FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT population FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY population ASC;
SELECT * FROM InfrastructureImpact WHERE carbon_emission < 50;
SELECT infra_type, energy_consumption FROM InfrastructureImpact WHERE infra_type LIKE 'road%';
SELECT city_name, temperature FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT city_name, population, temperature FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT city_id, city_name, temperature, population FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact WHERE city_name LIKE 'New%' AND temperature < 25 ORDER BY city_id;
SELECT * FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact WHERE population < 50000 OR temperature > 30;

SELECT city_name, population, temperature, infra_type FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact JOIN InfrastructureImpact ON UrbanDevelopmentImpact.city_id = InfrastructureImpact.infra_id WHERE carbon_emission < 100 AND energy_consumption > 50 ORDER BY infra_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM UrbanDevelopment WHERE city='New York';
SELECT id, development_type FROM UrbanDevelopment ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT city, population FROM UrbanDevelopment WHERE population > 1000000;
SELECT city, emission_factor FROM UrbanDevelopment WHERE development_type='Smart City';
SELECT * FROM Infrastructure WHERE public_transit_usage > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM UrbanDevelopment ORDER BY city DESC, population ASC
SELECT city, population, development_type FROM UrbanDevelopment WHERE emission_factor > 0.5 ORDER BY city
SELECT city, road_network, public_transit_usage FROM Infrastructure WHERE carbon_footprint < 50
SELECT city, temperature_change, precipitation_change FROM ClimateChange WHERE sea_level_rise > 0.2 ORDER BY city DESC
SELECT city, population, development_type, emission_factor FROM UrbanDevelopment UNION SELECT city, road_network, public_transit_usage, carbon_footprint FROM Infrastructure
SELECT * FROM UrbanAreas ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT area_name, city, country FROM UrbanAreas WHERE city='New York';
SELECT infrastructure_id, type, construction_year FROM Infrastructure WHERE type='road' ORDER BY construction_year DESC;
SELECT data_id, record_date, temperature, precipitation, humidity FROM ClimateData WHERE area_id=3;
SELECT analysis_id, impact_score, analysis_date FROM ImpactAnalysis ORDER BY impact_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM UrbanAreas ORDER BY population DESC, avg_temperature ASC;
SELECT area_name, city, population FROM UrbanAreas WHERE country = 'USA';

SELECT i.type, a.area_name, c.temperature FROM Infrastructure i JOIN UrbanAreas a ON i.area_id = a.area_id JOIN ClimateData c ON i.area_id = c.area_id WHERE i.type = 'Road' ORDER BY c.temperature DESC;
SELECT a.area_name, i.type, ia.impact_score FROM UrbanAreas a JOIN Infrastructure i ON a.area_id = i.area_id JOIN ImpactAnalysis ia ON a.area_id = ia.area_id ORDER BY ia.impact_score DESC;
SELECT c.record_date, c.temperature, c.precipitation, c.humidity FROM ClimateData c JOIN UrbanAreas a ON a.area_id = c.area_id WHERE a.city = 'New York' ORDER BY c.record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM city_data;
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_data WHERE population > 100000;
SELECT city_name, avg_temperature FROM city_data ORDER BY avg_temperature DESC;
SELECT building_name, construction_year FROM building_data WHERE building_type = 'Residential' ORDER BY construction_year ASC;
SELECT infrastructure_name, construction_year FROM infrastructure_data WHERE construction_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010 ORDER BY construction_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM city_data ORDER BY city_id DESC, population ASC
SELECT city_name, avg_temperature FROM city_data WHERE population > 100000 AND avg_temperature > 20 ORDER BY avg_temperature DESC

SELECT c.city_name, b.building_name, i.infrastructure_name, cl.temperature, e.co2_emissions FROM city_data c JOIN building_data b ON c.city_id = b.city_id JOIN infrastructure_data i ON c.city_id = i.city_id JOIN climate_data cl ON c.city_id = cl.city_id JOIN emissions_data e ON c.city_id = e.city_id WHERE b.building_type = 'Residential' AND i.construction_year > 2000 ORDER BY cl.temperature DESC, e.co2_emissions ASC
SELECT city_name, AVG(population) as avg_population FROM city_data GROUP BY city_name HAVING avg_population > 50000 ORDER BY avg_population DESC
SELECT * FROM city_data WHERE city_id IN (SELECT city_id FROM building_data WHERE building_type = 'Office' AND construction_year < 2000) ORDER BY city_id ASC
